title: Epic Drives
overview: Join Motor Trend as we hit 200mph on a German autobahn in a Corvette ZR1, take an Audi R8 past the fjords of Norway, or drive a Lotus Evora 1500 miles through the Rockies. Epic Drives is the ultimate road trip show that puts some of the world's coolest cars on the some of the world's greatest roads -- and brings you along for the ride.
